item.title: 9.1 Change logs
item.description: Change logs # Want to see version history. Click on Help > Change logs. See details here

item.title: 9.2 Feedback
item.description: Feedback # To generate feedback, people do the following: Step 1 : Choose Help > Feedback. Step 2 : The dialog box appears as shown below: When opened, it will display according to the profile of the account being imported. Name + Phone + Email : Can edit other name. Content: Description of screen information/problem that is faulty, needs to be checked or is not reasonable, needs to be changed/corrected,… Image : Click Upload.
